please_login: Please log in to place an order.
hero_banner_text: New customizer! Our 3D designer is live
hero_subtitle: Comes to you faster than you can think
content_intro: Showcase your products, apps, or packaging with high-quality 3D visuals that impress clients and boost conversions” all from your browser.
content_feature_instant_desc: Upload your design and see it applied instantly on realistic 3D surfaces” no rendering delays.
content_feature_cloud_desc: All mockups are rendered in the cloud ” freeing your computer and saving time.
content_feature_lighting_desc: Adjust light, shadows, and reflections with a simple slider to match your brand mood.
content_paragraph2: From startup branding kits to full product campaigns, our 3D mockup platform makes visualization intuitive and fast ” no modeling experience required.
content_web_tools_paragraph: Design, preview, and export your mockups directly from your browser. Collaborate in real time, share links, or download high-res renders instantly. Simplify your creative workflow today.
footer_tagline: Customize quality apparel and merch with fast turnaround and premium prints.
footer_newsletter_subtitle: Get product updates and special offers.
product_hoodie_desc: Comfortable cotton hoodie with premium print.
product_mugs_desc: Durable ceramic mugs with vibrant prints.
product_tshirt_desc: Soft, breathable T-shirt made from organic cotton.
admin_allowed_formats: Allowed formats: PNG, JPG, WEBP. Max. 5MB.

about_page_title: About Inkspire | Story, Shipping, and Policies
about_meta_description: Learn about Inkspire: our mission, team snapshot, shipping timelines, returns, privacy, cookies, and terms of service.
about_hero_title: Inkspire makes limited-edition streetwear that feels crafted, not mass-made.
about_hero_subtitle: We blend tactile fabrics, precise prints, and responsive manufacturing so every drop feels personal—from Leipzig to your doorstep.
about_mission_intro: Inkspire exists to bring elevated streetwear to life through small-batch drops, honest sourcing, and storytelling you can feel. We collaborate closely with artists and printers to keep every release transparent and traceable.
about_value1_desc: Small, intentional batches that keep every release special.
about_value2_desc: Trusted mills, fair partners, and planet-first dyes.
about_value3_desc: Materials, lead times, and pricing spelled out up front.
about_team_body: Drop in a team photo or a short founder message to show the faces behind the presses. Keep it raw, keep it human.
about_team_quote: "Every garment should tell you who made it and why it matters."
about_team_note: Add your founder blurb or a quick audio/video clip reference here.
about_shipping_customs: Customs and import duties are paid by the recipient. Tracking emails are sent automatically the moment a label is printed.
about_return_rule1: 30-day window from delivery; items must be unused and unwashed.
about_return_rule2: Customs/custom-made items and final sale pieces are excluded unless defective.
about_return_rule3: For EU customers we provide a prepaid DHL label; all other regions cover return shipping.
about_return_start: To start a return, email returns@inkspire.studio with your order number. EU customers receive a prepaid DHL label; other regions can choose their preferred carrier.
about_return_refund: Refunds are issued within 5 business days after inspection. We can also arrange exchanges or repairs when stock and construction allow.
about_privacy_point1: What we collect: account + order details, payment status, and support history. Optional analytics/ads only after you say yes.
about_privacy_point2: Why and how long: accounting + tax records for 5 years; analytics for up to 18 months.
about_privacy_point3: Your rights: request a copy, correct or delete data, and withdraw consent anytime. Reach our DPO at privacy@inkspire.studio.
about_cookie_notice: Cookie notice: we use essential cookies for cart, checkout, and authentication. Analytics and advertising cookies stay off until you opt in, and you can change that choice anytime.
about_tos_point1: Use of site: no scraping, automated misuse, or harmful activity.
about_tos_point2: Orders: occasional pricing corrections may occur; VAT is included where applicable.
about_tos_point3: Intellectual property: all designs, artwork, and content belong to Inkspire.
about_tos_point4: Liability: we limit liability to the maximum extent permitted by law.
about_tos_point5: Governing law: German law applies; courts of Leipzig, Germany have jurisdiction.
about_partner_lead: Precision 3D-printing and textile finishing for custom apparel and merch.
about_partner_coverage: Leipzig HQ; EU-wide distribution; DHL/UPS lanes: 1-3 day transit for DACH, 3-6 days for the rest of the EU.
about_partner_facility: 1,800 m2 production floor with a climate-controlled print bay and on-site finishing/packing.
about_partner_banner_note: Wide production floor banner with DTG/UV printers; inset showing the QC station.
about_partner_capability_dtg: DTG: Kornit Atlas MAX + Brother GTXpro bulk for cotton blends.
about_partner_capability_uv: UV flatbed: Canon Arizona for hard goods (metal, acrylic).
about_partner_capability_dyesub: Dye-sub: Epson SureColor F-series for performance fabrics.
about_partner_capability_finishing: Finishing: 6-station heat press line, laser contour cutter for patches, inline QC + bagging.
about_partner_capability_color: Color: ICC-managed workflows; Pantone matching on textiles where possible.
about_partner_materials_inks: Water-based, OEKO-TEX Eco Passport inks; GOTS-compliant options on request.
about_partner_materials_garments: Garments: ring-spun cotton tees/hoodies; recycled polyester options for performance lines; ceramic blanks for mugs.
about_partner_quality_qc: 3-stage QC: pre-print fabric/blank inspection, post-print visual check, final pack audit.
about_partner_quality_profiling: Profiling: device-linked ICC profiles per substrate; weekly nozzle checks and calibration.
about_partner_quality_samples: Sample protocol: first-run proof kept for 30 days; photo confirmation available.
about_partner_sla_production: Standard lead: 48-72h production after artwork approval; rush lane available for <24h on stocked SKUs.
about_partner_sla_packaging: Packaging: branded or neutral; recycled mailers as default.
about_partner_sla_returns: Returns/remakes: print defects remade within 48h; shipping damage claims with photo evidence.
about_partner_sustainability_power: Renewable electricity at the facility; wastewater filtration on DTG pretreat.
about_partner_sustainability_certs: Certifications pursued/held: OEKO-TEX Eco Passport inks, FSC packaging; ISO 9001-lite SOPs documented.
about_partner_team_photo: Print lead + QC supervisor shown; two shifts Monday-Saturday.
about_partner_logistics_lanes: DHL/UPS lanes; customs-free within the EU; guidance for non-EU orders on request.
contact_subtitle: Need a quote, custom design help, or support with an order? Reach out by phone, in person, or use the form. We are real humans ready to help.
contact_form_subtitle: Tell us what you need and we will get back quickly.
contact_form_phone_hint: Include country code and numbers only.
contact_form_message_placeholder: Tell us about your project or question...
contact_form_success: Thank you! Your message was sent successfully.
contact_form_error_email: Please enter a valid email address.
contact_form_error_phone: Please enter a valid phone number.
contact_form_error_message: Please add a short message (min. 10 characters).
contact_form_error_send: Sending failed. Please try again in a moment.
